mapper.select:
select
from feature_file where class_num between #{classNum - 10,jdbcType=INTEGER} and #{classNum + 10,jdbcType=INTEGER} and and package_deep between #{packageDeep - 2,jdbcType=INTEGER} and #{packageDeep + 2,jdbcType=INTEGER} and and package_num between #{packageNum - 2,jdbcType=INTEGER} and #{packageNum + 2,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into feature_file
md5,
`name`,
version,
class_num,
package_deep,
package_num,

mapper.update:
update feature_file
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
package_deep = #{packageDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER},
package_num = #{packageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update feature_file set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_deep = #{packageDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_num = #{packageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into feature_file (md5, `name`, version, class_num, package_deep, package_num) values (#{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packageDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) on duplicate key update md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_deep = #{packageDeep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_num = #{packageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
